lenders.name: Catarina
lenders.loan_because: We Care a Lot

lenders.name: OnTimeAirFilters.com
lenders.loan_because:
As a startup, we value the entrepreneurial spirit and understand how starting one's own business can be a dream-come-true.  Kiva's loan recipients demonstrate that spirit and work hard to develop sustainable businesses that will support themselves, their families and their communities.  We understand the hardships that new businesses face and want to help give these entrepreneurs in developing countries the chance to achieve their dreams.  

As successful entrepreneurs, we feel it is our obligation and privilege to give back to those who are just getting started.  We believe that successful business started with Kiva micro-financing go on to create successful communities with a higher quality of life.
lenders.occupational_info: We offer a subscription service for air conditioner and furnace filters.  Our goal is to make keeping your HVAC units in tip-top condition, without ever having to think about it!

lenders.name: New York Land Man
lenders.loan_because:
We want to help entrepreneurs help improve their own lives without being limited by access to capital. Through kiva, we hope to bypass the endemic corruption and wasteful administration costs of aid programs and efficiently assist the working poor to become successful.

We encourage kiva donors to check the portfolio yields of the field partners. There are plenty of field partners with 20% and under portfolio yields.

They can also create community groups, network discuss various community matters relating to education, food, shelter, politics or any other subject.

lenders.name: Bob & Gina
lenders.loan_because: i am a business owner.

lenders.name: RB & DB
lenders.loan_because: We care about our fellow human beings. We pray for peace world wide, and want to help people help themselves.  We are striving to give God a reason to continue to bless the USA, as well as the faithful worldwide.
lenders.occupational_info: We are working to reduce the amount of the world's energy we and our customers consume.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I think its a very small thing I can do to make someone's life better.

lenders.name: Coby
lenders.loan_because: The world needs a little less poverty and a lot more hope.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled much of the world over the past several years and met some extraordinarily talented people who may not have been as financially blessed as me.  I would love to see them have the same opportunities as I have had to create a brighter future.

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: I think it's cool to help people, and in particular, I like to help people be self supporting and not dependent on handouts.  That's not good for either the giver or the recipient.
lenders.occupational_info: I help keep computers running that allow people to access the internet, and provide some of the services they use (email, web, etc).

lenders.name: Ric Kaestner
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other small business owners because I know what it is like to work for yourself. Special people have been kind to me and loaned  me money when I needed it  so I want to do the same for someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: Ric is a property manager for a self storage company in San Diego California.

lenders.name: Ea
lenders.loan_because: I feel that if I have some money I do not urgently need, I would rather lend it to someone who can put it to good use and make a change in her and her family's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I just graduated from university where I studied business, leadership and strategy. I am now looking for a job.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.occupation: College Student at University of Florida

lenders.name: Kirsten
lenders.loan_because: It's awesome to be able to do something useful even though I don't have tons of money.  It makes me happy.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm in my 4th year of medical school, I'm going into Family Medicine to prevent and treat medical illnesses of babies, children, and adults of all ages.

lenders.name: May Thria
lenders.loan_because: it's our responsibility to take care and help each other

lenders.name: Aimee
lenders.loan_because: I truly believe in the life-changing effect of micro-credit programs. The way to a better world is through empowerment of communities!

lenders.name: Marco
lenders.loan_because: So little can go so far for people in need. This is a fantastic way to help people!!

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are willing to work hard to be successful. Best wishes!
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired. I used to represent employees in school districts such as instructional assistants, bus drivers, maintenance and cafeteria workers, and secretaries.

lenders.name: aika
lenders.loan_because: I want the world to become fair and peaceful place.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: ...it's fun.
lenders.occupational_info: I program web applications for large companies.

lenders.name: Kristel
lenders.loan_because: Micro-credit is a great way to contribute to the development of emerging countries.

lenders.name: Patsy
lenders.loan_because: I want a peacefull world
lenders.occupational_info: IT consultant. Active member of 'Solidarité Informatique Sans Frontières' (http://www.sisf.be), webmaster (open source CMS)

lenders.name: Colin
lenders.loan_because: I think it's the most respectful way to help those less fortunate than myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop software for community consultation projects - to help projects to record their interactions with the communities they affect.
